gw.plugin.note

Class INoteTemplateSource

  • gw.plugin.note.INoteTemplateSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class INoteTemplateSource
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    An interface fronting access to note templates. An implementation may simply store templates in a local repository, or, a more sophisticated implementation might interface with a remote document management system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INoteTemplateDescriptor getNoteTemplate(ILocale locale, String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the note template for the template filename.
      INoteTemplateDescriptor getNoteTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the note template for the template filename.
      INoteTemplateDescriptor[] getNoteTemplates(String strTopic, String strType, String strLOB, String[] keywords)
      Returns an array of note templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
      INoteTemplateDescriptor[] getNoteTemplates(ILocale locale, Map<K,V> valuesToMatch)
      Returns an array of note templates that satisfy the specified criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getNoteTemplate

        INoteTemplateDescriptor getNoteTemplate(ILocale locale,
                                      String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the note template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale that the template should be produced in
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A note template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

      • getNoteTemplate

        INoteTemplateDescriptor getNoteTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
        Returns the note template for the template filename.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A note template instance corresponding to the specified template filename.

      • getNoteTemplates

        INoteTemplateDescriptor[] getNoteTemplates(String strTopic,
                                         String strType,
                                         String strLOB,
                                         String[] keywords)
        Returns an array of note templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        strTopic - The note topic. If null, returns templates w/o regard to topic.
        strType - Specifies the type of note templates to return (e.g., diagram, actionplan). If null, returns templates of all types.
        strLOB - Specifies the line of business criteria for the templates. If null, returns templates w/o regard to line of business.
        keywords - An array of keywords for selective searching.
        Returns:
        An array of document templates matching the specified criteria.

      • getNoteTemplates

        INoteTemplateDescriptor[] getNoteTemplates(ILocale locale,
                                         Map<K,V> valuesToMatch)
        Returns an array of note templates that satisfy the specified criteria.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale that the not will be produced in
        valuesToMatch - "topic" The note topic type. See NoteTopicType "type" Specifies the type of note templates to return (e.g., diagram, actionplan). See NoteType "lob" Specifies the line of business criteria for the templates. "keywords" keywords An array of keywords for selective searching.
        Returns:
        An array of note templates matching the specified criteria.
